panels.title: Memory Max Usage / Requests and Limits ( table)

targets.query: kube_pod_container_resource_requests_memory_bytes: >=$min_memory_request AND clusterName.keyword:$cluster AND buildTime.keyword:$buildtime AND namespace.keyword:$namespace AND pod.keyword:$pod AND container.keyword:$container AND microservice.keyword:$microservice

panels.title: Memory WorkingSet (this is what the OOM killer is watching for)

targets.query: kube_pod_container_resource_requests_memory_bytes: >=$min_memory_request AND clusterName.keyword:$cluster AND buildTime.keyword:$buildtime AND namespace.keyword:$namespace AND pod.keyword:$pod AND container.keyword:$container AND microservice.keyword:$microservice

panels.title: Memory Usage (this metric also includes cached items that can be evicted under memory pressure)

targets.query: kube_pod_container_resource_requests_cpu_cores: >=$min_cpu_request AND clusterName.keyword:$cluster AND buildTime.keyword:$buildtime AND namespace.keyword:$namespace AND pod.keyword:$pod AND container.keyword:$container AND microservice.keyword:$microservice

panels.title: CPU Max Usage / Requests and Limits ( table)

list.definition: {"find": "terms", "field": "microservice.keyword","query": "clusterName: $cluster AND buildTime: $buildtime AND namespace: $namespace AND node.keyword:$node AND NOT microservice.keyword: eric-data-search-engine-curator" }
list.label: µService
list.name: microservice
list.query: {"find": "terms", "field": "microservice.keyword","query": "clusterName: $cluster AND buildTime: $buildtime AND namespace: $namespace AND node.keyword:$node AND NOT microservice.keyword: eric-data-search-engine-curator" }

list.definition: {"find": "terms", "field": "pod.keyword","query": "clusterName.keyword: $cluster AND buildTime.keyword: $buildtime AND namespace.keyword:$namespace AND microservice.keyword:$microservice AND node.keyword:$node" }
list.label: POD
list.name: pod
list.query: {"find": "terms", "field": "pod.keyword","query": "clusterName.keyword: $cluster AND buildTime.keyword: $buildtime AND namespace.keyword:$namespace AND microservice.keyword:$microservice AND node.keyword:$node" }

list.definition: {"find": "terms", "field": "container.keyword","query": "clusterName.keyword: $cluster AND buildTime.keyword: $buildtime AND namespace.keyword:$namespace AND pod.keyword:$pod  AND microservice.keyword:$microservice AND node.keyword:$node" }
list.label: Container
list.name: container
list.query: {"find": "terms", "field": "container.keyword","query": "clusterName.keyword: $cluster AND buildTime.keyword: $buildtime AND namespace.keyword:$namespace AND pod.keyword:$pod  AND microservice.keyword:$microservice AND node.keyword:$node" }
